name: Road Distaster Inventory System Web Application V1.0.0
author: Department of Public Works and Highways, Republic of the Philippines
description: The Road Distaster Inventory System Web Application (RDIS Web) V1.0.0 is a project of the Department of Public Works and Highways (DPWH) of the Republic of the Philippines, in partnership with the Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA), Geospectrum Marketing Services, and Geospectrum Analytics Services, Inc.
